user.title: Welcome to HASS AI
user.description:
You are about to set up HASS AI, an integration designed to bring a new level of intelligence to your smart home. Its goal is to automatically understand which of your devices are most important for home automation.

After this initial setup, a new "HASS AI" panel will be added to your sidebar. From there, you can run a scan to see how the AI has weighted your entities and then override its suggestions to perfectly match your needs. In the next step, you will configure the automatic scanning interval.

configure.title: Configure HASS AI
configure.description: Set the frequency for automatic entity scans.

panel.llm_warning: This system only works with Large Language Models (LLMs) like Google Gemini or OpenAI ChatGPT. Please ensure your default conversation agent is configured correctly.
This system only works with Large Language Models (LLMs) like Google Gemini or OpenAI ChatGPT. Please ensure your default conversation agent is configured correctly.
